title: Scheduling information
description: Trait that applies planning information to a document or resource. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.

websked_sort_date.description: Date to be used for chronological sorting in WebSked. This should only be set internally.

deadline_miss.description: The delta between the story's planned publish date and actual first publish time, in minutes. This should only be set internally.

note.description: Story note used for planning purposes.

planned_publish_date.description: When the content is planned to be published.

scheduled_publish_date.description: When the content was first published.

word_count_planned.description: The anticipated number of words in the story.

inch_count_planned.description: The anticipated length of the story in inches.

inch_count_actual.description: The current length of the story in inches.
